note.p: Career: Enter Royal Navy (1811); served under George Byng, 6th Viscount Torrington (FRS 1817); was employed on steamboats on the Hudson and Delaware Rivers (1836-1839); served in the Chinese War (1840-1843); Rear Admiral (1863); Vice Admiral (1869); Admiral (1875)
Notes: DNB gives birth date as circa 1797; Boase gives 1800.
